name: Ekikrat
overview:
Ekikrat is a sanskrit word which means compilation (Resembles alot to Ekatrit which also means same)

Ekikrat.in is looking to fill information void in Indian web space where there is very high signal to noise ratio. There are just too many voices with very little substantial factual information at one place. It is NOT a wikipedia and certainly not a community blog or social networking websites.

Ekikrat.in is looking to provide Information which Indians are searching for
